price: Kandi izuba rigana mu mwanya ryashyiriweho (ni ikimenyetso kuri bo). Uko ni ukugena k’Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Umumenyi uhebuje.
arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wal-shamsu tajrī limus'taqarrin lahā dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
